entries.title: Hate speech rises on Twitter in its largest markets after Musk takeover
entries.description: More than 75 percent of the company’s 280 million daily users live outside North America. The cuts in Twitter's moderation efforts have hit them hardest.

entries.title: Lunar relations: The U.S., China and a new brand of space race
entries.description: NASA is hopeful that a new international coalition will help propel its return to the moon.
